2025-09-02.Quotes: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
2025-09-02.Author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

2025-09-03.Quotes: In the middle of every difficulty lies opportunity.
2025-09-03.Author: Albert Einstein

2025-09-04.Quotes: Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.
2025-09-04.Author: Nelson Mandela
